page.title: 04TOURISM
page.content: { The North Devon area attracts many thousands of holidaymakers. The surrounding area is an ideal centre for a holiday by the sea. It provides good beaches as well as being the centre of Sailing and Water Sports. Many of the visitors make use of Bed and Breakfast establishments whilst others prefer to come by caravan or tent. The Lagoon View Holiday Park provides facilities to cater for the camper. It is a large and well run site with many amenities including a clubhouse and a childrens' playground. It is also possible to hire a caravan there.
